channel.title: Do you have ideas for Auxy 7?
channel.description:
If you have ideas for Auxy 7 like new demo sounds,new copyrighted projects or anything you like to bring as a idea for Auxy 7, then this is the right topic on where you will place your mind changing ideas for Auxy 7. Good luck on your ideas.
Also please make your own Auxy 7 intro so that lenberg can choose one of the demos you made here. And also put SoundCloud links for the new copyrighted projects from any person who uses Auxy and got popular & then again lenberg will listen to it and then remake it and then make it to the new copyrighted projects for auxy 7. Thanks & have a blessed time. May Allah Bless you all!!!

item.title: Do you have ideas for Auxy 7?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
So yeah, 70 updates since I last looked. Wild. I’d suggest sending an email to feedback@auxy.co perhaps? This is getting very out of hand. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Do you have ideas for Auxy 7?
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Okay:

It’s one thing to have ideas to present for consideration for if/when we see Auxy 7 roll out. But the way that you are going about this is very self-righteous and dismissive of other people’s genuine ideas about what could make Auxy truly great. You are saying that we need more soundpacks with this and that, but we ALWAYS get soundpacks. That’s not the point of a version update. If you recall when 5 and 6 released, there were big changes to the functionality of the app as a whole.

You are also being very demanding and unreasonable with how you’re going about presenting your ideas all-around. You can’t sit here and tell the devs what to do with their own app. You can’t present them with project files and insist that they are “featured projects” to represent an iteration of Auxy that has yet to come out, and thus would be a serious misrepresentation of what the capabilities of the app would be at that time.

No one here is “clogging up” your thread. They are presenting ideas that they feel would make Auxy a more powerful DAW, and to dismiss those ideas (like you did with @Zeph) is a slap in the face to your fellow musicians. You need to take a moment to step back and realize that this is a community with a shared goal of making better music with a better Auxy, and you should treat them as such.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you have ideas for Auxy 7?
